item.description:
ADVANCE TICKET DISCOUNT *SEPT 9 to 11  * CTPartyClub.com  Weekend Blast at the All-Inclusive Club Getaway Resort

***ADVANCE TICKET DISCOUNT until SEP 5 or we sell out at http://www.CTPartyClub.com Call (860) 386-5151

LAST DAY TO GET YOUR TICKET IS WEDNESDAY SEPTEMBER 8

What is Club Getaway? Watch the video at
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_9i07jsg1vE&feature=fvsr

 

Where can you enjoy Kayaking and Canoeing on a private lake, Hiking, Dance Lessons, Wine Tasting, Softball, Volleyball, Gourmet Food, Music, and Non-Stop Parties – all in one place for one low price? Only at Club Getaway - Connecticut and New York’s favorite Vacation Staycation All-Inclusive Resort!

 

“Club Getaway is the best value in vacation weekend getaways – we received thousands of dollars of food and activities for a fraction of the cost – there were no add on fees or hidden charges – everything was included!”

 

CTPartyClub.com invites you to the ultimate party weekend – Friday September 9 to Sunday September 11 at the beautiful Club Getaway in Kent –at a weekend party that includes private activities with these 2 groups, an Instant Intro session performed speed dating style to ensure that everyone get t o know each other, reserved dining sections for the group, a private meeting area, and opportunities to enjoy other activities in smaller groups.

 

The activities offer a great variety of what the great outdoors has to offer - everything from dance lessons and dancing to golf and tennis lessons, biking and hiking to softball and volleyball, zip line and trapeze lessons to water skiing and scuba lessons – with a generous helping of food, music, wine, and new friends.

 

You can either arrive on Friday night, or meet up with us for lunch on Saturday – and then join us for our private group only events like wine tasting - and enjoy meals with us at our private dining table. Make new friend with people in our private group – set your own schedule and enjoy the activities that you like to do – when you want to do them! And of course – there is always plenty of food, wine, and music to keep the party going!

 

What to bring: The weather will be hot during the day –perfect for swimming, scuba, kayaking and swimming in Club Getaway’s private lake, and cooler at night - great weather for the Bonfire and a flannel shirt or light jacket. Each cabin has a private bathroom with shower – don’t forget your toothbrush! One recent guest at Club Getaway tells us “ Bring your camera to capture what may be the most fun that you have ever had”.

 

SinglesCT.com tells us – “ It’s all about meeting new people, combined with great food and wine, and all the outdoor activities that you can imagine – at a very inexpensive price that includes everything”

That is why people keep coming back to Club Getaway– year after year!

 

CTPartyClub.com will have private events scheduled for our group only

- including a private Wine tasting, Golf Lessons, Archery Class and more

Meet New Friends At The PARTY OF A LIFETIME!

Club Getaway
59 S Kent Rd
Kent, CT 06757

SPACE IS LIMITED - RESERVE YOUR SPOT TODAY

***ADVANCE TICKET DISCOUNT until SEP 5 or we sell out at http://www.CTPartyClub.com Call (860) 386-5151

Get your ticket before SEP 5 for only $337.80
(includes all taxes and fees) 

Tickets are $371.58 (includes all taxes and fees) after SEP 5

LAST DAY TO GET YOUR TICKET IS WEDNESDAY SEPTEMBER 8

The CTPartyClub.com private events include Wine Tasting, Massage, Texas Hold’em Poker, Golf Lessons, and Archery – and a private table and meeting area

 

~ACTIVITIES INCLUDE~

Drinks and Hors D'oeurves on the Lake Side Deck

Welcome Dinner with Free Flowing Wine in the Mountain House Dining Room
Lakeside Happy Hour: Live Music, Complementary BBQ Grill and Drink Specials

Texas Hold'em Poker

Restauratore Italiano - Italian Restaurant with complimentary wine under the Tent followed by Live Music and Dance Club

The Awesome 80's Party at the Boat House Lounge with DJ Craig Cruise.

Dancing till the wee hours -Midnight Campfire with Live Music and S'mores

Co-ed  Softball with Beer Keg

Join us in The Boat House Lounge for Opening Party, Champagne & Dancing with DJ Craig Cruise
Wine Tasting with Wine Expert Host

Play Volleyball & Basketball under the Lights

Sumptuous Buffet Breakfast

Early Morning Mountain Hike

Yoga with NYC's OM Yoga

Massage

Water Ski, Kayak, Swim, Boat, Canoe, Row in our Private Lake

Bounce and Bound on the Water Trampoline and the Climbing Wall Iceberg

Tennis Lessons with Pro Ken

Basketball Clinic with Former NY Knicks Hollis Copeland

Fly on the 350' Aerial Zip Line

Cardio Kickboxing with Jen Fitness

Intermediate Tennis Lessons with Tennis Pro

Mountain Bike on Single Track Trails

Rock Climb - Rappel Down a Rock Ledge

Volleyball Clinic - Bump, Set & Spike

Road Biking - Easy Ride on 21 Speed Specialized Bikes

Hike Along the Appalachian Trail

Kayak Class on the Lake

Learn to Fly on the Trapeze

Pilates with Jen Fitness

Challenge the Climbing Wall

Scuba Class

Arts & Crafts

Archery Class

Golf Lessons with Silo Ridge Pro

Tennis Tournament

Intermediate Road Biking - 10 miles

Co-ed Volleyball Tournament

Latin and Swing Dance Class with Lucky

Walk to Kent for Shopping or Ice Cream

Advanced Trapeze

Trip to Local Vineyard

Fly on the Bungee Trampoline

Advanced Road Bike

Swing Dancing with Lucky

Bike Trip to Town for Ice Cream
Aerial Acrobatic Show

Bike to Town of Kent

Rock Climb - Rappel Down a Rock Ledge

Mountain Hike to Scenic Overlook

Mountain Bike II - Single Track Trails Intermediate

Dodgeball Team Challenge

Kick Boxing with Jen Fitness

6-Mile Scenic Bike Trip

Lakeside Live Reggae Band

Hike or Bike Ride on the Appalachian Trail

Meet New Friends At The PARTY OF A LIFETIME!

SPACE IS LIMITED - RESERVE YOUR SPOT TODAY

Get your ticket before SEP 5 for only $337.80
(includes all taxes and fees) 


Tickets are $371.58 (includes all taxes and fees)

 ***ADVANCE TICKET DISCOUNT until SEP 5 or we sell out at http://www.CTPartyClub.com Call (860) 386-5151

LAST DAY TO GET YOUR TICKET IS WEDNESDAY SEPTEMBER 8
